# Evil Eye (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] \[[[Evil Spells|evil]]]

**Level:** Mortal Hunter 2, [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** Instantaneous (see text)

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Book of Vile Darkness (WotC), pg. 94

The caster focuses malevolent wishes through her gaze and curses someone with bad luck. The subject takes a â€“4 luck penalty on all attack rolls, saves, and checks. The spell ends at the next sunrise, when dismissed, when a *[[Remove Curse (Spell)|remove curse]]* is cast on the subject, or when the caster takes at least 1 point of damage from the subject.
